title: Baroque dance 1675-1725 (TEFC)
brief_description: The dance which evolved to perfection within the French Academy though called ‘Baroque’, shares attributes with French classicism. Presents the dance within the visual context of the period showing the consistency in concept with other arts of the time. No other credits available.
